talk_text: Finally, it's time to show what I'm made of.

No no, this would be the stage
of Master Hawk's splendor!
Ugh, what an unruly bunch.

Isn't that nice.
I was hoping to have some more chat
with Miss Elizabeth!

It won't end
until the Prince is satisfied anyway.
Let's have some sweets together.

Miss Flonne, Miss Etna.
Thank you for having me!

While Laharl and Meliodas are having their contests,
King and Merline
are searching for Diane.

Since they are not familiar with the Netherworld,
Killia and Mao accompanied them.

All right,
let's go find that Diane.

Wow, a helping Mao?
That's a rare spawn.

I heard that Diane was a Giant.
What a valuable research subject.
*huff* *huff*
Here you go again, Mao.

Look, Mao. Our goal is
to help King find Diane.
Don't you forget that.
And we need your help too, Seraphina.
You can count on me.

But since you need my help,
Sir Killia, you'll have to
heed my request♪

...All right.
I'll make you some curry.

Sir Killia's curry!?
Well that's tempting...

It's not the time for curry!
Let's hurry and find Diane
for my experiment!

Wait.
I won't let you
experiment on Diane!!

Sure.
Then I'd like to study on demons.
You must have plenty of data on that.

Hmhmhm. Merlin, right?
Looks like you are congenial to me.

However, with my 1.8 million EQ,
I don't think you can understand my research---
Wait. Guys, I think I heard something.
And earthquake!?

It's Diane!
Thank God. You're safe!

Wait, King.
Something's wrong with Diane.
What's wrong?
Whoaaaa!!
Step aside!

Why are you attacking us,
Diane?
Ahhhhh!
We can't talk to her.

Let's stop Miss Diane
for now.

That's right.
Mao and Merlin, do something
to bring her back to normal in the meanwhile!
I'd be happy to deliver the final strike.

Hang on, Diane.
I'm rescuing right now!

Diane! Are you okay?
Diane!
King...?

[Diane]
The Serpent's Sin of Envy
of the Seven Deadly Sins,
a member of the Giant Clan.
Despite her lack of magic abilities, she is unparalleled when it comes to strength.
Among her kindreds,
she is a rare peace-loving girl.

I'm sorry. I was conscious, but I couldn't
control my body, and did terrible things
to you, King...

Don't mind it.
It's not your fault, Diane.

But how
did this happen?
It's him.

Let go of me!
How dare you ruin
my perfect plan!

He was hiding and watching us.
Apparently, this guy put hypnosis on Diane
when she was unconscious.

You manipulated me
into hurting everyone!

Hmhmhm.
Your overwhelming strength
can be used to fulfill my ideal.

In other words,
I appreciated your strength and put it to good use.
And you should be grateful for that!

Do you think
I'll buy that?

You were going to use it for
something stupid anyway.

What, how dare you mock my ideal!
The Vulcanus Harem I was going to build
with that Giant's power---

Shut up!
And fly!
Ahhhhh...!?
null_s

Wow, that's a
beautiful and satisfying trajectory.
Sorry, everyone.

No problem.
We're the ones who
summoned the Seven Deadly Sins after all.

Oh... Now I feel hungry
as I got relieved.

That's a good chance.
I'll cook you some Netherworld dishes.
It's the least I can do to make amends.

Sir Killia makes the best cuisine in the Netherworld!
Once you taste it,
you may give up returning to your own world.

That good!?
I can't wait!
But returning is a problem indeed.

That's not a problem.
Mao and I
are working to fix the Summoning Pot.

Mao, you're being awfully cooperative.
Have you made up your mind to become a delinquent?

Hmph. Merlin has been
doing research in the other world.

I've just been promised that if I cooperate,
she'll show me the documents.

It's a research document from another world.
I wonder what kind of interesting things it contains...
*huff* *huff*

I just can't wait!
Let's fix that thing right now!

So, Rozalin.
What are you going to do now?
...I'm going to find Adell.

I suppose.
What about you then?

Um...
Wouldn't it be better
if we work together?

No no.
It's usually more efficient
to split up and search.

But how could I keep an eye
on Fake Zenon if we split up! What about my
undercover investigation then!

...I prefer
to stick with #NAME# too.

Even now...
I'm not sure I'm ready
to be alone with him...
I know you are troubled, Miss Rozalin.

This is it!
We will stick together
and find Mr. Adell!
Mm-hmm. Thanks.
Big news, dood!

The war between Prince
Laharl and Mao has started, dood!

So it's started. 
Hey, #NAME#.
Which one would you wager on?

This is no time for jokes!
This would be a disaster! We have to stop them!
In the Overlord's Castle
null_s

Urgh...!
The Prince is nowhere to be found.

I'm sure they are not far away
because of the game console
they left turned on...

...Agh!! I get it!
Prince Laharl
must have entered the game!

What?
Into the game...?

Let me explain!
This is the Motion-sensing RPG, Netherworld Wars!

It's an insanely immersive game
that puts you inside the game and
lets you enjoy the world of virtual reality!

Do whatever you want in the virtual world!
Follow your heart and desires!
An unruly legend of Doomsday Overlord!

There have been countless demons
who got too addicted to return to reality!

All right, kids!
Do not play more than 25 hours a day!

So, it's a game that you can actually enter.
What an amazing world we live in.

But the situation can't be that dire
since they are playing the game.

That's naive, Miss Rozalin!!
Too naive!!

This Netherworld Wars
is a terrifying game!!

This Netherworld Wars
is a terrifying game!!

What...?
When a character dies,
its player dies too!

What!?
So you die in game,
you die in the real world!?
Yes...

As expected of a Netherworld game...
How unruly.

So, Prince Laharl is currently
in this game, and that means...!

The Prince is fighting Mao
in the game world.

#NAME#.
You are going to stop the war between them, right?
I'll go with you.

Well. You helped me
find Adell.
I shall return the favor.

If Rozalin is going,
I'm going too.

And me too!
I'm pretty good at games!

Well, #NAME#.
It would take a lot of preparation to stop that war
between Laharl and Mao, right?

Like leveling,
reincarnation,
and grinding in item world...

Hoho!
You know so much, Miss Rozalin!

Hmhmhm! Rest assured!
Actually me and Miss Etna have
super powerful characters in our saves!

They are the strongest, to be frank.
When it comes down to it,
we'll stop them, don't worry.
Hm. That's reassuring.
Then, click!

Flonne launched the game
and selected "Continue"
from the title screen!

Regrettably,
Save2 and Save3
are gone.

Wh-what!!?
I gave up my daily routine of watching Tokusatsu DVD
to level that saved!!!

Kyeeee!! My Lv.9999,
grinded day and night
by Prinnies!!!

The hard-grinded game saves
have been deleted by someone!
An outrage it is!

So this is why
Prince Laharl got so mad...

I see.
No wonder he's so pissed off.

Miss Etna!
Let's catch the culprit at all costs!

Sure!
I'm gonna kill him!

Etna and Flonne
have forgotten their purpose...

"Regrettably,
Save2 and Save3
are gone."

...So,
we have no choice
but to start a "New Game".
null_s

This is the game world.
Amazing...

I'm not sure about the details,
but it seems that the game world and the real world
are synced by magic.

So you die in game,
you die in the real world.

By the same logic,
when you fight enemies in the game world,
you gain experience in the real world as well.

This may be
a good training place for #NAME#.

There!
Enemy spotted!
Slime has appeared!

Slime.
A classic of all classics.

A shame is not metallic,
but oh well!
It will feed my level!

Rozalin...
So there's a side of you that liked games.
I didn't know that.

No. I didn't know anything about you.
And I never tried to learn...

All I had in my head
was revenge...

You know a lot
about the game, Rozalin. How come?

Urgh...!
I'm not much of a gamer,
but I do know my way around.

Heh, that's surprising.
You don't give an image of a game player.

...I used to
play alone in the castle back in the days.

Playing the games he bought me
was a good way to drown out the loneliness
of not seeing my father...

I didn't know that...
I didn't know I made you feel that way...

But it's taking longer to level up
than I thought.

Isn't there a convenient way
to level up all at once with a bang?
...Let's go try the Cave of Ordeal.

Yeah, let's go.
It might be a bit risky, though.

That's it, #NAME#.
From here on, the enemy will be stronger.

Ooohhhh!?
Power...
Power flows in my vein!!
Fake Zenon has leveled up!
Skin Age, 125 UP!

Skin Age, 125 UP!
Eye Dryness, 13% UP!

Skin Age, 125 UP!
Eye Dryness, 13% UP!
Aged Odor, 21% UP!

Rozalin, look!
My stats have increased
at an incredible rate! Hahahahaha!

...On stats that
you'd keep them low...

Rozalin,
I'm so happy
to play this game with you.
Yes?

I had always dreamed of
playing games with my father.

I didn't need all those flowers and gifts.
Rather than that, I wanted to see my father.
And have fun together...
Rozalin...
null_s

That's something more of a father-daughter conversation
than I imagined...

Could it be that Fake Zenon
is beginning to feel the love of a father...?

No, absolutely not!
That infamous Fake Zenon!
He'll come out of his shell soon enough!

And you, #NAME#.
Before we take on Laharl,
let's test our skills with a boss character.

And so, next up...
BOSS STAGE!!
Hahahahahaha!

Bonjour. Long time no see, everyone.
Speaking of Boss, it would be moi,
the Dark Adonis---

Y-your Majesty,
King Krichevskoy!?

Bonjour. Long time no see, everyone.
Speaking of Boss, it would be moi,
the Dark Adonis---

Y-your Majesty,
King Krichevskoy!?
Oh, Mr. Mid Boss.

I am NOT Mid Boss!
I am the Dark Adonis---

His real name is Vyers the Dark Adonis.
His official name, however,
has become "Mid-Boss" since Laharl ruthlessly said,
"Your new name is Mid-Boss."
Actually, His true identity is is Laharl's father,
a close friend of Archangel Lamington,
King Krichevskoy himself.

Now I'm
not Krichevskoy,
but Dark Adonis...

Mr. Mid Boss is a Mid Boss
even in the game world. I'm impressed.

Your Majesty...
Despite all those complaints,
you actually enjoyed the life of a Mid Boss, right?

Hmhmhm!
You did it, #NAME#!

However, I am but the weakest
among the Four Guardians!!

Only despair and death
wait in your future!!

Looks like Mr. Mid Boss
IS having fun...

He's the one I always admired.
What a mixed feeling...

After the Mid Boss comes the Big Boss,
that's the routine...
But what exactly will we encounter here?

Ha-hahhaa!!
You're finally here, #NAME#!

So here comes the Big Boss of Netherworld Wars!
Axel, on stage!!
Ah! It's Mr. Axidiot!

What?
You're in a higher position
than King Krichevskoy? I cannot accept that.

It's been a while.
Still, you look the same as ever,
Axel the Reaction Comedian.

Who's a Reaction Comedian!
I am the Dark Hero!!

I have great ambitions!
Being the Big Boss here is just a stepping stone!

One day, I will become
the Final Boss...
No, the Ultimate Hidden Boss!

And I'm going to create the Dark Hero Legend
that surpasses the Legendary Live!

Come on, #NAME#!
Let's dance in THE LAST BATTLE!!

That's not much of a fight
for someone who talks that big.

His style
never changes.

Why?
I'm supposed to be getting stronger
with the title of Big Boss.

Mr. Axidiot.
What matters is your heart, your inside.

But his inside is a disaster
for all that matter.

Enough of that!
Now that you defeated me,
just move on, #NAME#!

Looks like this is
where we fight the Final Boss.

Fwah-hahaha!
I'm impressed that you came this far, death!
#NAME#!

Urgh...!
What an evil aura!
Are you the Final Boss!?

Exactly!
I am the ultimate despair!! The ultimate disaster!
The ultimate horror and the ultimate catastrophe!
This, this is...!!

The super dangerous person
on the Boss Blacklist...!

Are you ready for this, fools?
Destruction to those
who stand in my way...!

I am the Final Boss of Netherworld Wars!
DESCO the Final Weapon!!

I am the Final Boss of Netherworld Wars!
DESCO the Final Weapon!!

I see.
So Miss Desco is the Final Boss here.

Yes, death! I'm training to be the Final Boss
not only in the game,
but in the real world as well, death!
Is this little girl the Final Boss...?

Ah! You were a Final Boss,
right, death!?
Um... sort of...

Great, death!
Then Desco will be qualified as the Final Boss
by defeating you, death!

Ahahahaha...!!
Now sacrifice your body
for Desco's ascension to the Final Boss!

...and thus,
the battle between Hero
and Final Weapon Desco
has come to an end.

But remember,  #NAME#!
As long as evil exists!
My power lasts!

One day, I shall awaken once more!
Until then, enjoy your momentary peace!
Ahahaha! Ahahahaha...!!

All right, that's it, death.
Congratulations, death.
Please watch the ending, death.

Hey,
this is not the time for ending!
We have to find Prince Laharl!

The Next Episode! The new show
Overlord Cutie Pretty Etna
will be on air!!
No it won't!!

Well then, I and Flonne will be off
to search for the Prince and others.
Miss Rozalin, and Mr. Fake Zenon.

While we are not around,
please act as #NAME#'s
secretary.
What....?
What...?
Thank you!!

Etna and Flonne
just slunk off!
How ridiculous!!

... So what am I supposed to do
as a secretary,
#NAME#?

I was experienced as a Final Boss,
but not a secretary...
Hmmm...

It's a bit absurd
to ask these two to be secretaries.
What are they thinking...?

Ah! Could it be a strategy
to reform their bond of father and daughter
through cooperation?

All right!
Etna and Flonne can do it.
And so can I.

#NAME#!
Thanks for logging in today!
Starting from there!?

#NAME#!
You've received a new gift!
Please claim it!

...Huh? Miss Rozalin.
From where did you get that gift?

From where...?
It's right there
when I noticed.
No, don't touch that!!

What a surprise!
The Gift was actually a Mimic!

The Mimic attacks Rozalin
with its sharp fangs!!
Watch out! Miss Rozalin!!
Rozalin!!

Mimic Attacks!
A grievous blow on Fake Zenon!!!!!!
Ugrhhhhhh!!!

F-father...!!
You protected me...!?

Rozalin... You are safe.
I'm glad... guh!!
Father!!!!

Ummm...
This is...?

Father!!
Thank god...
I'm so relieved that you are all right...

I cast a special Celestial Healing on him
so he'll be fine.

Thank you, Lucy.
You have my gratitude.

You, you are welcome.
It's kind of embarrassing... Hahaha.

Lucy.
I wish to thank you too.
I appreciate it.

This is a big surprise.
That infamous Fake Zenon
actually thanked someone.

He even sacrificed himself
to save Rozalin...

Could he change deep in his heart
because of his newly gained family love...?

I need to report this
to Boss...

#NAME#!
We've found Prince Laharl!

Rozalin.
How was the secretary job?

Nothing special,
just...
null_s

Heh.
Didn't see that coming.

I'm happy for you, Miss Rozalin.
Looks like Mr. Fake Zenon's love
may be real this time.

Ummm...
I couldn't help but call him "Father" too.

Etna. Flonne.
Thank you for your arrangements.

What are you talking about?
I don't know anything about that.

That's right.
We didn't do anything.
Right, #NAME#?

Hmph!
You are really...

Come on!
Let's stop the war
between Prince Laharl and Mao!
null_s

Whoa!
So powerful, even in a game!

Prince Laharl's save
has been deleted once, yet he's already
leveled up so much!
null_s

Hmph... Mao.
I heard that it's your first time playing this game,
but you're doing pretty well.

Of course I am. I shall show you that
experience is not the only thing that matters
in a game.

But still...
I'm surprised you got that
"Ebony Blue Sword".

Where did you get it?
Tell me later.

Okay. But in exchange,
you shall tell me how to get that
"Dark Scarlet Shield" of yours.
null_s

It seems...
those two are just
playing game together.

Do you have any idea
how much time I spent to restore my character
after you deleted my save...

You did something you shouldn't
as a gamer...

I'm going to defeat you now
to avenge my save data!

Ooooohhhhhh!!
This is for the dead save data!
null_s

Urgh...!
I don't know anything about your save data,
but I won't back down from a fight!

All right, I'll show you!
I'll show you how my 1.8-Million-EQ-Brain
works on this game!!

The ultimate move
developed with my
class-skipping playtime!!!!
null_s

Hmph! That was good, Mao!!
As expected of the Dean of Evil Academy!

You too!
As expected of Overlord Laharl!
It would be boring otherwise!

Looks like you have an
extraordinary passion for games.

But that's a horse of a different color!
I shall defeat you right now!!

I'll admit to your enthusiasm for the game,
but I'm not going to
concede victory to you!

A game is where you devote every effort!
I shall be the one who wins in the end!

Ugghhh...!?
Dammit...
The drowsiness...

I'm not sleepy at all. I'm an Overlord,
an all-nighter is a piece of cake...

Urgh...!
Where's my clear mind...?
I can't let sleepiness get me...
null_s

Looks like they are at their limits
for the overnight playing.

Now, #NAME#!
Let's get them both!

Dammit, #NAME#!
Don't you dare meddle...!

But damn...!
My eyes are heavy...!!

What's the matter, Laharl?
Are you at your limit?

Tough talk, Mao!
You're all dizzy
and bleary-eyed, too!

No, I'm not!
My eyes are still glowing!!

Urgh...!
So it was a mistake
to choose this time-consuming game...!

At this rate,
we won't be able to settle the score!!

n...Then I have a proposal.
Let us settle it in the next game!!

Deal!
FTG, STG, AVG, or FPS!
You name it! But I will be the winner!!

That's my line!
My brain is ready for any game!
I will not be defeated!

Well, well.
You two just wanted to play games, don't you?

Hmhmhm!
Looks like their love for game
has brought about a good ending.

The Gaming War between Laharl and Mao
ends here!!

...Huh?
That's it?

Now listen! I'm going to bed!
Those who disturb my repose will be put into eternal sleep!
Do not awake me!

Well done,
#NAME#.

I guess that's it then,
as these two will not be up anytime soon.
Or better, we could just kill them in their sleep...

Bi-bi-bi--
Big news, dood!!!

Lord Valvatorez and Sir Killia
has started a gun fight, dood!!!!

So it's them this time.
I'm going to take a break.
It's on you, Flonne.

No no.
You are coming too, Miss Etna!

#NAME#!
This time we'll have to stop Mr. Valvatorez and Mr. Killia!
Let's move, gogogo!

Well, well.
Busy as a bee.

Agreed.
But I shall accompany you.
To prove my love.

...Miss Lucy.
Time to report, dood.

All right, all right.
Tell the Boss,
that something has changed in Fake Zenon.

He hasn't been cleared of the suspicion as a spy.
But judging from his attitude towards Rozalin,
it's as if he...

As if he's trying
to be a real father...

Hey, you.
What are you doing?
Gyaaah!!?

Lucy lifted the Prinny
and threw it at Etna!!
Pray!!

Etna hits the Prinny back
with a metal bat she pulled out of nowhere!
Nice batting!
null_s

Oh my... Sorry about that.
I got startled
that I threw that Prinny. Teehee.

... Isn't that suspicious?
Well, it doesn't matter.
null_s

Boss ordered for a backup
in case like this, dood.

That's the Boss.
Then, tell Diez
to attack me again!

They'll get suspicious at this rate.
I must be this poor Fallen Angel
targeted by a demon!

I'm sure Lady Etna already notice, dood.
But that's the job, so...
Aye aye, dood!!
To be continued

Phew, today's work is pleasant!
And tomorrow's schedule is confirmed.
I can go to bed now.

Good night, Matt Mirror.
See you tomorrow.

What?
Did the mirror just glow?

W-what happened?!
U-urgghhhhhh...!
null_s

*cough* *cough*
Seriously, what just happened...?

Huh? When did I come outside the house?
And, I don't think I've ever been here before.
Come to think of it, the mirror suddenly glowed and then...

Oh, geez! Where's the mirror!
Where are you, Matt's Mirror?
Teeheeheehee... ♪

Thank god...
You're okay.
... but wait?

The color is not right.
It wasn't this dark style before.

But the mirror is now emitting a slightly mysterious aura.
Maybe I'll find the new side of myself
for makeup♪
Fwah-hahahaha!!

Eh!? Something is flying in this direction?!
Wait a minute! H-help me!!

Listen up!
One just can't become an advocate for love and justice overnight!

[Cute Flonne]
The leader of the Cutie V
in a red uniform, of course!
Because the leader of rangers always wears in red!
As an advocator of love, she protects all kinds of love,
from the trivial love for crab miso to the extraordinary love for the entire universe!

If you call that "too much",
I'm afraid you'll never
become qualified rangers!

But it IS too much.
We've been training since 4 a.m., meow.
I must take a break, meow! And enjoy my hard-earned catnip, meow!

[Cute Chacha]
She was busy picking peaches on a towering cliff
when her athletic potentials were appreciated by Cute Flonne,
who later convinced her to join
the Cutie V as its first reserve member.
She loves her carefree life
and was reluctant to join the Cutie V at first.

Don't worry, Chacha.
A bottle of mustard sauce
will get you refreshed in no time!

[Cute Merlin]
The second reserve member of the Cutie V,
she has a zeal for mustard sauce
and will add it to whatever she eats.
Her love for mustard sauce is so overwhelming
that she has even invented her own spells to protect it
and been preaching about the love for mustard sauce.

So,
#NAME#,
would you please bring that over for me?

Ta-da!
This is my homemade mustard milk!

Drink it
and you'll feel revitalized!

I'm pretty sure anyone but you
will be killed on the very first sip, meow.
Maybe even Cute Flonne will not survive...

*Take a gulp*
T-T-This is reeeaaaaly amazing!
I-I just can't stop drinking it...!

Did she actually drink it?!
A-are you okay, meow?

Y-yeah, I'm totally fine.
After all, this is the beverage
Cute Merlin made especially for us.
Thank you!
That was the first time I've ever seen someone break out in such a cold sweat, meow.

A-anyway, the break ends here.
Back to our training!
Teeheeheehee... ♪

W-what is this, meow?!
It appeared out of nowhere, meow?!

And there's a face on the mirror, too?!
Geez, look there, Cute Flonne!
That mirror is attacking passersby!

This is serious! We must help them out!
Call off the training!

Hey, ladies. I know this is a bit abrupt,
but you two are coming with me to stop that mirror!

That was really unexpected!
That mirror just attacked that guy!

And I feel some ominous miasma emanated from it.
nIt'll be dangerous if we leave it unchecked.

I'll purge its evilness with my
Cutie Purification.

Let me explain!
What is Cutie Purification?

It's Flonne's special move that
can only be used in the Cute Flonne form!

An all-out attack full of love, kindness and something else
that completely purifies all kinds of evil!
Gaaaaahhhhh...

Wow!
The mirror shards are merged into one.

And that's a big smile, meow!
The mirror must be so happy, I guess, meow?

This should be fine for now.
But what exactly happened
on with this mirror?
S-someone! Please, help me!

Hmmm... someone is asking for help again!
Cute Merlin and Cute Chacha,
let's hurry over there!

Oh, come on! I'm totally exhausted by the battle just now, meow.
Please, I want to take a break
while enjoying my catnip, meow.

I knew you'd say that, so I've already prepared
catnip Merlinated in mustard sauce!
Feel free to enjoy it on the wya!
Noooo!! My catnip!
Heh-heh-heh♪

You don't recognize me? Matt's Mirror?
It's me, Matt!
Squeak! Squeak! Squeak!

Have you lost your mind after you turned dark?
What should I do... Someone help me, please!
This is it!
The overflowing love is the proof of justice!

We are the cutie rangers!
Cutie V!!

Pooh... catnip with mustard sauce...
That's was even worse than mud, meow…

Ah, it's my turn to say my lines, meow.
We'll punish you for the sake of the Overlord, meow!!

Hey, isn't that a Ranger?
Are we shooting a tokusatsu movie?
Fwah-hahahaha!

Do you still want to attack me?!
Help me!!
That guy is being attacked by the mirror!

Hey, we haven't even finished our signature transformation yet!
What a presumptuous mirror!
*Stare*...

Ah, #NAME#.
Is it just me? Or the man who is being attacked
does look like the face in the mirror, meow?

...Oh, really.
What does that mean?

That can wait!
We must save that man first!
